extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    Lucia Rivas Molina , Daniel Santo-Tomas

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.Boolean approveOffer​()
      The admin can approve offers changing the offer state to AVAILABLE
      java.lang.Boolean askForChanges​(java.lang.String changes)
      The admin can ask for changes in offers changing the offer state to CHANGES The asked changes are saved in the changes field of the object, and the date of when the changes have been asked is saved too.
      java.lang.Boolean bookOffer​()
      To reserve an offer it state changes to RESERVED It creates a new reserve and adds it to the guest's list
      java.lang.Boolean buyOffer​()
      The connected guest pay an offer without booking it The function sets the offer state into BOUGHT and adds the offer to the guest's list of reserves
      java.lang.Boolean calculateRate​()
      Calculates and sets the average rate of all the comments
      java.lang.Boolean commentOffer​(int rate)  
      java.lang.Boolean commentOffer​(java.lang.String text)  
      java.lang.Boolean compareOffer​(Offer offer)
      Two offers are equals if they have the same house, price, state and iniDate
      java.lang.Boolean denyOffer​()
      The admin can deny offers which do not check the requirements changing the offer state to DENIED

      • bookOffer

        public java.lang.Boolean bookOffer​()
                            throws NotGuest,
                                   NotRegisteredUser
        To reserve an offer it state changes to RESERVED It creates a new reserve and adds it to the guest's list
        Returns:
        Boolean if the reserve has been successful or not
        Throws:
        NotGuest - in case the user is not a guest
        NotRegisteredUser - in case the user is not Registered

      • buyOffer

        public java.lang.Boolean buyOffer​()
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        The connected guest pay an offer without booking it The function sets the offer state into BOUGHT and adds the offer to the guest's list of reserves
        Returns:
        Boolean if the purchase has been successful or not
        Throws:
        NotGuest - in case the user is not a guest
        NotRegisteredUser - in case the user is not Registered
        java.lang.Exception

      • compareOffer

        public java.lang.Boolean compareOffer​(Offer offer)
        Two offers are equals if they have the same house, price, state and iniDate
        Returns:
        Boolean : true if the offers are equals and false if not

      • denyOffer

        public java.lang.Boolean denyOffer​()
                            throws NotAdmin
        The admin can deny offers which do not check the requirements changing the offer state to DENIED
        Returns:
        Boolean if the function has been successful or not
        Throws:
        NotAdmin - if the user who tries to deny an offer is not an admin

      • approveOffer

        public java.lang.Boolean approveOffer​()
                               throws NotAdmin
        The admin can approve offers changing the offer state to AVAILABLE
        Returns:
        Boolean if the function has been succesful or not
        Throws:
        NotAdmin - if the user who tries to deny an offer is not an admin

      • askForChanges

        public java.lang.Boolean askForChanges​(java.lang.String changes)
                                throws NotAdmin
        The admin can ask for changes in offers changing the offer state to CHANGES The asked changes are saved in the changes field of the object, and the date of when the changes have been asked is saved too.
        Returns:
        Boolean if the function has been successful or not
        Throws:
        NotAdmin - if the user who tries to deny an offer is not an admin
